text: Da Vinci's Inquest is a Canadian crime drama series produced by the Canadian Broadcasting Corporation for the CBC Television. It starred Nicholas Campbell. The show ran from October 7, 1998 until January 23, 2005. The show centers around a coroner and former RCMP undercover officer named Dominic Da Vinci. He travels around the city of Vancouver and trys to help investigate crimes. A spin-off titled Da Vinci's City Hall was broadcast on CBC Television. It focused on Da Vinci and his political career after he became the mayor of Vancouver. It ran from October 25, 2005 until February 28, 2006. Nicholas Campbell won the Gemini Award for Best Performance in a Continuing Leading Dramatic Role for his role as Da Vinci. For five out of six seasons, the show won the Gemini Award for Best Dramatic Series. ==References== ==Other websites== * * Category:1998 Canadian television series debuts Category:2005 Canadian television series endings Category:Crime drama television series Category:English-language television programs Category:Legal television series
title: Da Vinci's Inquest
